about_the_game:
Team online shooting games - only action and nothing extra!



Code of War is an online shooting game with the best 3D graphics, real physics and a huge selection of weapons.
Test your skills in a dynamic online action against players from all over the world!
Become the best and take the first places in the ranking table of the whole world!
Improve the skill and skills of your fighter to become even stronger!
Fight with your friends and reach the top of the rating table in the modern online action game Code of War!
Invite your friends and play online with them!



features:
• Modern 3D graphics!
• A large selection of weapons and leveling your fighter
• Lots of camouflage and drawings
• Multiple battle arenas
• Intuitive controls that are suitable for both novice shooting players and hardcore gamers
• Complete daily tasks and strengthen the fighter
• A general chat that allows you to communicate with the players of your country
• Dynamic fights and crazy action with no time for respite.
• You can choose any game mode: team or individual. And all this is for FREE!



BECOME THE BEST
Join our fan communities. Be aware of the newest updates!
Take part in gaming tournaments, take first place in the ranking!

Fill your life with thrills, start your battle!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Code of War Gun Shooting Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Code of War is an exciting online shooter. Show shooting skills, fight in multiplayer modes and upgrade your character. Addictive gameplay, high-quality graphics and adrenaline on the battlefield. Join the community and become a real hero today!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
